pageProduct.name: Nutra-Life Kyolic Immunity Shield 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Nutra-Life Kyolic® Aged Garlic Extract™ Immunity Shield combines proprietary Kyolic® Aged Garlic Extract™ with Vitamin C, Vitamin D3 & Zinc to support and maintain a healthy immune system.

Suitable For: Suitable for vegetarians.

Size: 60 Capsules

Serving Size: 1 capsule

Servings Per Pack: 60

KEY FEATURES

• Supports healthy immune system function
• Contains proprietary Kyolic® Aged Garlic Extract™

Warnings

Always read the label. Use only as directed. If symptoms persist, talk to your healthcare professional. Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet

Ingredients

Each capsule provides:
Allium sativum (Garlic) bulb dry extract 126mg
Equiv. Allium sativum bulb fresh 378mg
Zinc glycinate Equiv. Zinc 15mg
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3 1000 IU) 25 micrograms,
Calcium ascorbate dihydrate 13.62mg
Equiv. Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 11.25mg

Contains: Animal products

Directions

Recommended Adults Only dosage: Take 1 tablet daily or as directed by your healthcare professional.
